item.title: 2 wounded in Black Friday shooting at mall in Little Rock, Arkansas
item.description: The shooting occurred Friday afternoon at Park Plaza in Little Rock, Arkansas. Both victims are expected to make full recoveries, police said.

item.title: Police officer killed in shooting in Oak Park; suspect in custody
item.description: Oak Park Police Detective Allan Reddins was the first Oak Park officer killed in the line of duty since 1938.

item.title: Hiker missing for more than 5 weeks in Canadian wilderness is found safe
item.description: A 20-year-old hiker who went missing for almost six weeks in the Canadian Rocky Mountains was found alive this week and is recovering in a hospital. H...
